CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explaiins Warm-up task to MOT walks in the room briefly and then out in the hall . MOT and INV talk in the hall
CHI turns around and looks at MOT
MOT and INV continue to talk in the hall
<aft> INV walks away down the hall
Rara and Rah are also names MOT uses for CHI
CHI stands in the center of the room looking at MOT
<$=1> MOT puts her bags down somewhere out of camera view
CHI points to the toy car on the floor in front of her
<aft> CHI picks the toy car up
MOT looks down at the car
MOT still tries to remove CHI's sweater
CHI's back is to the camera
MOT fiddles with the zipper in CHI's sweater
the noise of static sparks flying
<bef> CHI is forced to sit on the floor as MOT pulls on her
CHI holds out her arms and looks at them
MOT walks out of camera view with CHI's sweater
CHI puts her hand on the car
MOT starts to remove her sweater
CHI reaches back with her opposite hand and glances at MOT briefly
MOT puts her sweater down out of camera range
CHI looks up towards the door then at MOT
CHI plays with the toy car
<bef> MOT walks over towards CHI . MOT tucks her shirt into her skirt while speaking
MOT sits in the chair near the desk
CHI turns and looks up at MOT
<bef> CHI looks down at the car . CHI examines the car closely
CHI grabs the wheels with her hand
CHI looks down at the car
CHI's back is to the camera
MOT kneels next to CHI and turns the wheels of the car in front of CHI
<bef> MOT sits back . MOT looks at CHI
CHI smiles and looks up at MOT
MOT nods and looks at CHI
<aft> CHI looks at the other side of the room
MOT makes a sweeping motion on the floor with her hand
CHI looks towards the opposite wall
<2-4> CHI looks down at the car . <aft> CHI looks up at MOT
CHI rolls the car on the floor
CHI puts her hand on MOT's leg
MOT rubs some lint off of her lap

CHI rolls the car next to the waste basket

CHI throws the material into the waste basket
CHI leans over and looks into the trash
MOT looks at the other toys on the floor
CHI leans over looking into the trash
MOT squeezes the rubber duck in front of CHI
CHI uses the trash can to pull herself up to stand
CHI turns around CHI looks at the duck and smiles
MOT holds the duck in front of CHI while squeezing it
CHI reaches for the duck smiling
CHI leans close and looks at CHI
CHI looks down at the duck
CHI looks down at the duck
CHI takes a step closer to MOT
CHI looks down at the duck
CHI looks down at the duck closely
MOT moves her head close to CHI
MOT takes a lint ball off of CHI and drops it in the trash
CHI looks into the waste basket
CHI walks away from the trash and accidentally drops the duck
MOT stands the duck up on the ground
CHI looks down at the duck and points to the duck's eye
MOT nods slightly as she watches CHI
CHI looks down at the duck smiling
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI looks closely at the duck
CHI squeals in a high pitched excited tone
CHI looks down at the duck
CHI looks up at the door
MOT reaches over to the duck
CHI looks down at the duck
MOT sits back and looks at CHI
CHI bounces the duck off of her mouth
CHI looks down and turns around
MOT turns the jack+in+the+box to face CHI
CHI walks over to the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI drops the duck
MOT picks up something on the floor
MOT sits back and watches CHI
CHI tries to open the jack+in+the+box
the jack+in+the+box music starts to play
MOT looks down at the object in her hand and also CHI
MOT looks down at the toy duck which she is holding
MOT tries to mend the duck
MOT blows into the duck and re-inflates its head
MOT gives the duck to CHI
MOT smiles and looks at CHI
MOT makes a pushing motion with her thumbs
CHI blows the duck and shows MOT
MOT moves very close to CHI when speaking
CHI hands the duck to MOT
CHI starts to turn away from MOT
CHI runs over to the book
CHI picks up the book and brings it over to MOT
MOT puts the duck on the floor
MOT leans close to CHI and looks at the book
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI holds the book open while standing as she looks at the pictures in the book
CHI turns her back to the camera as she stares at the book
CHI walks towards MOT with the book
<bef> MOT lowers the book so that she can see it
MOT points to the picture of a fish in the book
CHI looks at the book and has her back to the camera
MOT looks down at the book
CHI looks down at the book
<$=1> MOT looks down at the book
CHI's back is still to the camera
MOT points to a picture in the book
MOT is reading the book with CHI but CHI has her back to the camera and is blocking the book and MOT out
MOT points to the picture and looks up at CHI
CHI looks at the toy car on the floor
CHI looks down at the car and starts to reach for it
<aft> MOT turns a page of the book
MOT nods her head and looks down at the book
CHI picks up the duck and squeezes it
CHI holds the duck up to her mouth
MOT looks at CHI and smiles
CHI accidentally lets go of the car
the car rolls under the chair
CHI turns and looks for the car
CHI tries to retrieve the car
INV enters the room to explain Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place .
INV re-enters at and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT
INV has MOT sit next to CHI at the table . INV clears away the toys from Small Scale Activity
<bef> INV takes the object out of the drawer
INV holds the forbidden object upright on the table
INV gives CHI the squeezy toy to hold
MOT puts CHI farther back in the chair and pulls her closer to the table
INV puts the squeeze toy on table in front of CHI
CHI looks down at the toy
INV sets the object into motion
MOT looks down at the toy
MOT squeezes the toy all around CHI
CHI looks at MOT and reaches for the toy
CHI looks down at the toy and then up at the object
CHI squeezes the toy and then sets it on the table
CHI smiles and looks up at the object
MOT squeezes the toy twice and then brushes the brush on the table
CHI tries to get around MOT's hand to touch the object
MOT restrains CHI by squeezing the toy vigorously between the CHI and the object
CHI reaches back for MOT then up at the object
CHI puts her hands up in front of her and stares at the object
MOT tickles CHI with the toy
CHI shakes her head then climbs off the chair
MOT tickles CHI with the brush
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity
MOT walks over to the desk
CHI stares at the ball box
a noise is heard in the hall
CHI walks over to the chair at the table
MOT knocks the ball against the sides of the box
<bef> MOT walks around so that she is facing CHI . MOT holds out the ball for CHI
CHI reaches out and takes the ball from MOT
CHI holds the ball high over her head
MOT looks at CHI and starts to put her hands out to catch the ball
CHI throws the ball violently on the floor
the ball rolls into the box and knocks it over
MOT catches the ball and sets the box upright
CHI looks at the box then extends her arms
MOT holds the ball out to CHI and looks at her
MOT gives the ball to CHI
MOT turns CHI around to face the camera
the ball rolls into CHI's foot then into the chair
CHI looks down at the ball and follows it
CHI bends down and picks up the ball
as CHI bends down to pick up the ball she sees the car under the chair
<aft> CHI walks over to the box
CHI drops the ball into the box
CHI looks down at the ball
CHI turns back towards the desk
MOT takes the ball out of the box
<bef> MOT rolled the ball to CHI feet

CHI walks over and drops the ball into the box
CHI looks down at the ball in the box
CHI picks up the box and carries it over to MOT
CHI looks down at the ball
CHI puts the box down and takes the ball out

CHI holds the ball and looks at MOT
MOT holds her hands out to receive the ball
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT gives the ball to CHI
CHI catches the ball then throws the ball to MOT
<bef> MOT catches the ball . MOT throws the ball to CHI
MOT catches ball then gives CHI the ball
CHI holds the ball out to throw it smiling
MOT drops the ball and retrieves it
CHI points to the video camera
MOT nods her head and looks at the camera
CHI walks to the other side of the room
MOT looks down at the ball
CHI looks down at the ball
MOT puts the box in front of CHI
MOT points to the ball and then to the box
CHI holds the ball and looks at MOT
CHI drops the ball into the box
CHI holds out the box for MOT
CHI walks over and gives MOT the box
MOT takes the box from CHI
CHI reaches in the box and grabs the ball
CHI stares at the video camera
MOT holds the box with the ball in it
CHI lets the ball fall back into the box
CHI turns around and looks at the box briefly
CHI tries to climb up onto the table
MOT shakes the box with the ball in it
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI takes the box from MOT and shakes the box with the ball in it and then drops it violently
MOT holds the box up for CHI
CHI takes the ball out of the box
<bef> MOT sets the box down on the floor
CHI drops the ball and it rolls under the chair
CHI walks over to the chair
CHI looks down and reaches towards the car
CHI turns around and faces MOT
MOT leans back with her arms extended
CHI holds the ball and looks at MOT
MOT looks at CHI still holding her hands out to take the ball
CHI looks at MOT and smiles
MOT points to the chair across the room
CHI looks at the chair at the table
MOT points to the chair at the table
CHI starts to walk to the chair
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI watches the ball go past
CHI runs over to the waste basket
MOT puts the ball in the box
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT takes down the next box
MOT starts to open the box
CHI looks down at the box
CHI starts to open the box
MOT leans close to the floor
CHI removes the cover and holds it up to her face
CHI drops the lid on the floor
MOT picks up the lid and puts it on the desk
CHI takes the towel out of the box
CHI looks at MOT then down at the towel
CHI looks down at the towel
CHI rubs the towel on her face
MOT goes over to help CHI with the cloth
MOT takes the towel from CHI
<bef> MOT covers her head with the towel
CHI tries to lift up the towel
MOT covers her head with the towel
MOT lifts up towel to peer out at CHI
<aft> MOT covers CHI's head with the towel
MOT leans back and looks at CHI
CHI stands under the towel briefly and then starts to pull the towel off
MOT holds the towel up to her chest and looks at CHI
CHI walks over to the waste basket
CHI bends her head forward slightly
CHI throws the towel off and picks it up
MOT leans back looking at CHI
MOT makes two fists and holds them up to her eyes
CHI holds up the towel and comes towards MOT
MOT grabs the sides of the towel and holds them up
CHI smiles and looks at CHI
CHI covers her head with the cloth
CHI stands under the cloth with her arms out
CHI walks away with the towel
CHI looks up at the camera
CHI stares up at the camera
CHI turns toward the opposite corner of the room
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI tries to remove the cushion of the panda chair
MOT comes over to the chair behind CHI
CHI looks down at the chair
MOT covers the panda chair with the cloth
MOT leans close and looks at CHI
CHI starts to push the chair forwards
MOT is off screen but seems to be opening a box
MOT gives the box to CHI
CHI begins to open the box
MOT starts to open the box
CHI stands back and watches MOT
CHI helps MOT pull off the cover
CHI examines the contents of the box
CHI leans down and looks in the box
MOT is out of camera view
CHI sits up straight and looks down into the box
MOT picks up a red crayon and shows it to CHI
MOT picks up the crayon , shows it to CHI and then puts it down
CHI sits down close to the box again
MOT puts a crayon in front of CHI
MOT gives CHI a piece of paper
MOT takes all the other sheets of paper away
CHI looks at the paper in the box
CHI looks down at her crayon
the crayon CHI is holding fell out of its wrapper
CHI looks down at the paper
CHI gets up to go over to the waste basket
CHI turns and looks at the camera
MOT pushes the box in front of CHI
CHI bends down and takes out a piece of paper from the box
CHI comes over to the table and draws on the paper
MOT takes a piece of paper
CHI looks at the other piece of paper
<aft> CHI begins to draw on the next piece of paper
<bef> MOT pushes the first piece of paper out of CHI's way
CHI stops drawing to turn the paper over then continues
CHI taps the paper with the crayon
CHI looks around briefly then down at the crayon
MOT pulls the box on the table closer
CHI stops drawing and takes a different crayon from the box
CHI stops drawing and puts that crayon in the box
CHI takes another crayon from the box and draws with it
CHI smiles and looks up at MOT
MOT puts a crayon in the box
<bef> CHI stops drawing and switches colors . CHI draws with a different crayon
CHI stops drawing and goes to put the crayon in the box
the crayon falls to the floor
CHI peels paper off the crayon
CHI throws the paper in the waste basket
CHI stands next to the waste basket and takes more paper off the crayon
CHI runs over to MOT holding the crayon out in front of her
MOT takes the crayon from CHI
MOT reaches for a new crayon
MOT takes a green crayon out of the box
MOT holds the crayon out to CHI . <aft> MOT puts the crayon in the box
CHI takes a different crayon out of the box and draws
CHI draws then makes dots then stops drawing
CHI takes another crayon from the box
footsteps are audible outside the door and CHI hears them
MOT takes a crayon and draws
MOT smiles and glances at CHI
MOT cocks her head and looks at CHI
MOT hands CHI some paper to put away

CHI starts thumbing through the paper

CHI picks up the paper and seems to want to draw again
MOT lifts the paper in the box to show CHI the crayons
CHI picks the paper up off the floor
<bef> MOT puts the paper in the box
CHI draws vigorously and draws on the table
MOT starts looking through the paper
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
